mapper.insert: insert into hz_cloud_share (id, user_id, share_name, share_password, share_time, `state`, share_num, share_desc, share_code, course_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sharePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update hz_cloud_share set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_name = #{shareName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_password = #{sharePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_time = #{shareTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_num = #{shareNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_desc = #{shareDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, share_code = #{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, share_name, share_password, share_time, `state`, share_num, share_desc, share_code, course_id from hz_cloud_share where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, user_id, share_name, share_password, share_time, `state`, share_num, share_desc, share_code, course_id from hz_cloud_share
